description: Detects VB DLL's loaded by an office application. Which could indicate the presence of VBA Macros.
author: Antonlovesdnb
false_positives: Alerts on legitimate macro usage as well, will need to filter as appropriate
name: VBA DLL Loaded Via Office Application
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\outlook.exe) AND dll.path:(*\\VBE7.DLL OR *\\VBEUI.DLL OR *\\VBE7INTL.DLL))
